pageContext.geocode_address: 8236 Southeast 24th Street, Mercer Island, WA 98040, USA
pageContext.public_note: Full Day Option Available, Space limited! Only Students in both classes will be supervised over lunch, no food provided by Play-Well. Please sign up for both classes and put a FULL DAY note in the note section!
pageContext.course_type_long_description: The Force Awakens in this introductory engineering course for young Jedi!  Explore engineering principles by designing and building projects using LEGO® materials such as X-Wings, R2 Units, Energy Catapults, Defense Turrets, and Settlements from a galaxy far, far away. Create motorized and architectural projects with imagination and engineering to defeat the Empire!
pageContext.email_registration_description: If you have questions about this camp, contact our Area Manager, Emily Kahler: emily@play-well.org or 520-548-1003
